description.value:
Requirements You're wielding a gun.

You target a creature's limbs or load-bearing appendages to weaken them. You Aim and then make a ranged Strike against your mark. If the Strike hits, the creature becomes your choice of @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the end of your next turn (@UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical hit).
